ComicInfo.Title: The Deadly Gambit of Conquer-Lord!
ComicInfo.Summary: The Deadly Gambit of Conquer-Lord!: The Moon Knight battles the Conquer-Lord on a giant chessboard.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-03-16 13:38:12. [CVDB16606] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 14:54:01. [Issue ID 30125]
ComicInfo.Characters: Merkins (dies),Conquer-Lord [Mr. Quinn] (also in flashback),Samuel,Moon Knight [Steven Grant,Mayor,Jake Lockley,Marc Spector] (also in flashback),Marlene Fontaine (also in flashback),Frenchie
